None.Name: Gifted Bond
None.Description:
Grants the targeted
friendly unit the ability to establish
an infernal chain between itself and
an enemy unit. While the bond exists
the targeted enemy will lose 85 life
points per second and the caster
regenerate 75 life points per second.
Reusable every 20 seconds.
